name: Custom order for Heidi
description: Custom order for a black chevron pouch with matching key fob. Price includes postage.

name: "All-in-one" bag pattern
description:
This listing is for the digital pattern to make yourself a gorgeous, "All-in-one" style handbag. Designed as a grab-and-go purse, the "All-in-one" can be used either as a clutch OR an over the shoulder bag. 
With 8 card slots, phone, pen and spare pocket and a central zipper divider pocket this compact bag has a spot for all the essentials.

Step by step easy to follow pattern, including clear photos and directions for every step. 

This pattern is written in a style that can be suitable for adventurous beginners but as it contains many elements I would recommend it more for advanced beginners/intermediate sewers and above.

Once your payment has been cleared through Paypal a copy of the pattern will be emailed to you as a PDF within 24 hours.


** Please note that the purchase is for the pattern only. The bags pictured are examples of what you could make using the pattern and are not included in the sale.

** Please also be aware that refunds are unavailable on digital downloads.

name: Zipper Pouch Pattern
description:
Learn how to make a zipper pouch using this very easy to follow pattern. The pattern is for a fully lined pouch with covered zipper ends for a professional finish and includes clear step by step photos for each stage in the process.
Measurements are also included at the end of the tutorial for 3 other variations in size, including cutting instructions for just using one overall one feature fabric for a less scrappy look, making this a very versatile pattern!

Once your payment has been cleared through Paypal a copy of the pattern will be emailed to you as a PDF within 24 hours.

name: 3 Pattern Bundle
description:
Choose any 3 of the Flutter from.Kat for purchase for the special discounted price.


**  Please note that unfortunately pattern bundles are not available for instant download, but every effort will be made to email you the patterns within 24 hours of purchase.

**  Please advise of your desired patterns in the notes section of Paypal when you purchase. 

**  Refunds are not available on digital products that have already been emailed.

name: Scrappy Quilted Pouch Pattern
description:
This listing is for the digital pattern to make yourself a gorgeous, scrappy quilted pouch such as the illustration.

This project is perfect for busting through those scraps and makes a really unique product each and every time.

Step by step easy to follow pattern, including photos for each step.

This pattern is written in a style that can be suitable for beginners, although some sewing knowledge is recommended.

The finished size is approx 9 by 5 inches (25 by 12.5 cm)

Once your payment has been cleared through Paypal a copy of the pattern will be emailed to you as a PDF within 24 hours.
